text: Gava ji bona wan ra (aha) be gotine: "(Geli kesan!) tista ku Yezdan hinartiye hun bibine peyrewe wi." (Ewan bersiv dane u) gotine: "(Na, em bi gotina we nakin) 1e tista ku em rast hatin; bav u bapiren me li pey wan bun, eme ji peyrewiya wan bikin." Gelo heke pelid ewan gazi bal agire hilopit kiribe ji, ewane disa (di sopa bav u kale xwe da) herin
